title: ALCS: Yankees Season Ends as Astros Head to World Series
description: The gap between the American Leagueâ€™s two best teams proved awfully wide, with Houston heading to the World Series as the Yankees wonder what went wrong.
dc:creator: James Wagner
media:credit: Johnny Milano for The New York Times
media:description: The Houston Astros are the third team to sweep a division series and a league championship series in the same season. The others were the 2014 Kansas City Royal and the 2007 Colorado Rockies.
